Author: lightningmcqueef69
Text: i definitely struggled just to get the words out and i had to tiptoe around it (eventually showed her my recovery post here) but i admitted it out loud and admitted i need help so it's.. a win? thank u so much

Author: mgonzo11
Text: that’s great for you man. of all my therapy sessions, I’ve never been able to just get it out. I’d have moments of choking on my words, really desperately wanting to say it but just covering it up with some other bullshit statement. you are exactly right, it’s like losing a toxic best friend. kudos to you for helping yourself; you got this :)
